welcome.message: Hey {mention}, welcome to !  Go ahead <#1042040912924135524> to gain access to all other channels and automatically be moved next time! if you do not verify within 1 hour you will automatically be kicked.
welcome.//msg-formats: if you type {mention} the user will mentioned.like {user} {tag} {rank}

antilink.rolesExcluded: Role ID which can use links

autokick.roleToCheck: Role ID, if user has this role, they won't be kicked
